text:
The use of antipsychotic medications can lead to liver function abnormalities,

which may increase the risk of developing liver disease (WHO). A study

published in the Journal of Clinical Psychopharmacology found that the use of

antipsychotics was associated with significant changes in liver enzymes and

bilirubin levels (6).

7. Comparison to Other Reports
